projects.title: Codeforces-POTD (Chrome Extension)
projects.subtitle: Featured Chrome Extension with 2k+ Users • 4.8/5 Rating
projects.preview: Featured Chrome extension with 2k+ users and 4.8/5 rating. Gamifies competitive programming practice with daily problems, streak tracking, and calendar interface.

projects.title: External Memory Merge Sort
projects.subtitle: High-Performance C++ Implementation for Big Data Processing
projects.preview: High-performance C++ implementation of external memory merge sort designed to handle 10GB+ datasets on memory-constrained systems with optimized I/O patterns.

projects.title: Moody: Real-Time EEG Emotion Classifier (BCI)
projects.subtitle: Advanced Brain-Computer Interface for Emotion Recognition
projects.preview: Advanced BCI system for real-time emotion classification from EEG signals, featuring SMOTE, ensemble learning, and 80-100% adjusted match rates with sliding window robustness.

publications.title: SET-PAiREd: Designing for Parental Involvement in Learning with an AI-Assisted Educational Robot

publications.preview: Investigating how AI-assisted educational robots can facilitate meaningful parental involvement in children's learning processes through the SET-PAiREd framework.

publications.title: Hybrid DCNN model for classification and detecting Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA) from digitized ECG signals
